content.p: Cookies help us to give you the best experience on our website. You can change your cookie settings if you wish. Otherwise we'll assume you're OK to continue.OKSee our policy We support researchers throughout each stage of the research lifecycle. The team has expertise in all aspects of scholarly communications. We contribute towards a range of activities supporting University-level research priorities and we work closely with each faculty to deliver support tailored to meet their research needs. Email us Explore our services We offer a range of specialist support services for staff and postgraduate research students. We provide expertise and support with: We welcome all enquiries. If you need some support, or would like to arrange training for your school or faculty, please email us at library-researchsupport@nottingham.ac.uk. Faculty focus: Medicine and Health Sciences Specialist areas: Faculty focus: Arts Faculty focus: Social Sciences Faculty focus: Science, Engineering King's Meadow Campus Lenton Lane Nottingham, NG7 2NR Please see our Help and support page for telephone and email contact points
